title: Do Pets Resemble Their Owners?
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Fufu, so cute~. Good girl, good girl~.... Kyaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Waaa! Shiitake! You shouldn’t do that~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’m fine, Chika-chan. Ahahaha, geez Shiitake-chan, that tickles~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ayumu-chan, won’t your uniform get dirty? Is it okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s alright! But, you’re so lucky, Chika-chan. Living with this adorable girl. I want to have a pet too~ It must be nice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hehehe, if you like our Shiitake-chan, then you can come by to touch her anytime<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay, thank you. You know, I’ve heard that pets resemble their owners before, that must’ve been true, huh? Because both you and Shiitake are so full of energy, Chika-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Resemble their owners….? Ah-!! I see-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You see, Shiitake always barks happily and plays around with all of my friends. It’s because I love everyone, so Shiitake must be the same…. So that’s it. Because of that, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
